text: The 2014–15 Stetson Hatters men's basketball team represented Stetson University during the 2014–15 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Hatters, led by second year head coach Corey Williams, played their home games at the Edmunds Center and were members of the Atlantic Sun Conference. They finished the season 9–22, 3–11 in A-Sun play to finish in last place.
